Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content:
Well I should've known a place to vent like this exists because I have many things going through my mind

I'm sorry if this has nothing to do with current events but I still wanna let it out

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: So historically, I was never lucky with girls, all of my infatuations end up in failure and rejection

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Especially the last one which lasted even after both of us graduated highschool

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I thought she was gorgeous with a very likeable, easy-going personality who would hang out with anyone

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: But then I started to realize and understand that my brain does something honestly pretty harmful

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I would distort or exaggerate some aspects of her personality and put her on a pedestal

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Because to be very honest, I didn't know a lot about her, I only knew rather superficial things about her and expanded my ideas of her on my own

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: And that's a trademark Nice Guyâ„¢ behavior

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I did try to talk to her and get closer to her, only for me to regret it thinking it was much worse that how it actually went

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Probably because I was trying to mask my "weirdness" and try to like the same things she does

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I don't mean the weeaboo type of weird or whatever parallels with it, I just thought she would be rather mainstream and general

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: And I tried fitting into that by a little bit, but I didn't like it

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Which is really bad

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Months later when both of us are now in college and I saw her on both of our semester breaks, I don't have feelings for her

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: But then I realized that she's actually pretty bland

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I don't think I'll ever bond well with her

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: And I don't think she would put up with me

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: So I guess that's the disappointment that culminated after months of fantasizing an exaggerated, distorted copy of her in my brain

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: And that's actually really messed up

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: And honestly I feel quite bad for her

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: The last time I ranted about this was with a really close friend of mine

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Now, this friend of mine was simply a background character for most of the time I knew her

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: We knew each other since we were 9 I think and we bonded over the fact that we both speak English with very Americanized accents

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: And we only started being close friends during our final years of highschool

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: It was very random too, she knew that I was really into music and she recommended to me a free DAW to play around

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Then we hung out just twice

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: We went to watch Kung Fu Panda 4 in the cinemas (I brought my sister with me)

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: And I realized that our dynamic was kinda funny

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: It was awkward obviously because it was the first time we hung out like this

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I was the loud extroverted guy and she was the quiet introverted gal

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: But it doesn't mean she's not goofy

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: We also hung out during prom, but I was spending more time with my other friends (especially because I was in a cover band at the time)

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: And yes, we had prom and the theme was the 1920s and both she and I wore costumes that were in different eras for some reason

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: And now ever since both of us moved for college (she's in KL and I'm still in Borneo), we talk exclusively online

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: She does seem to be more busy than I do, she has shorter semester breaks and less holidays overall

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Obviously since she lives in KL, everything is more expensive there

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: And we would just talk about stuff like we'd always do

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: But then it happened

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I'd hate to fall victim to this

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: That cliche of a guy falling for his girl best friend

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: But it's so odd

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I don't think I should do anything to take a step further yet, I still find it a bit early

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Yet I'm trying to understand why

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: But mostly it's because she's one of the first girls I've met to put up with my personality

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: And doesn't really mind that I have some unorthodox (or relatively unorthodox) preferences in music

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Hell, both of us share an interest in metal music

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I admire her solid moral compass

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I admire her boldness to just have unusual interests

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I admire her strife to further her studies in the field she truly enjoys

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I admire her being a fantastic listener

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I admire her for being so supportive

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I admire her for being goofy

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: And yet I still want to know more about who she is

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: She has such a wonderful personality, this time it's actually real

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: She's just being genuine and authentic

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: And that also makes me unafraid to be genuine and authentic

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I've rarely met a girl who could do this to me and I can't thank her enough for being this way

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: But I'm scared

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I've felt this strongly for her but I don't wanna ruin everything by telling her how I feel

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Maybe it's just a matter of time and maybe both of us are ready

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: I should distract myself with many other things

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Maybe I should go with the flow, and she should go with hers too

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: If we stay as close friends who have each other's back till the end, that would've been such a huge blessing

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: But if by some miracle the both of us actually get together, God knows how much that will make me even more grateful

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Whichever it is, I wish all the best for whatever's going on with her

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Pursuing her career in arts and I could support her along the way

Author: johnthesentientautomobile
Content: Like how she supports me through my shenanigans

Author: meat_l0f
Content:
I know that struggle all too well, the fear of ruining good friendship. But personally going with the flow is the best course of action. For me the risk of losing a friend is far greater than finding the one. If she is the one, it all will be in place.

Keep it mind that this is coming from a guy who never said his feeling to her girl 'friend' (not even best friend) that still hangs out in discord calls with our friend groups. 

All in all, friendship is magic and i hate the feelings that im feelings :__:
